response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that has been meticulously crafted and tailored to exceptional standards. This item holds immense value to me, not just financially but also on a personal level, due to its history and the effort put into its creation. Considering its significance, I am offering it to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its true worth, making it an excellent investment for someone like you who appreciates quality and exclusivity. I believe this product could greatly enhance your collection or serve as a valuable asset in your endeavors. I look forward to discussing the details further with you and am available for any questions or concerns you might have. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
